GV06kaussu_u:1.8.25_1: no devī pṛśniparṇī [2.25]> <ā paśyati [4.20]> <tānt satyaujāḥ [4.36]> <tvayā pūrvam
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.1_1: <ye agnayaḥ [3.21.1-7]> <brahma jajñānam [4.1.1]> ity ekā <uta devāḥ [4.13]> mṛgārasūktāny
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.1_2: uttamaṃ varjayitvā [4.23-29] <apa naḥ śośucad agham [4.33]> <punantu mā [6.19]> <sasruṣīḥ
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.1_4: mayaś ca naḥ [6.57.3]> <anaḍudbhyas tvaṃ prathamaṃ [6.59]> <mahyam āpaḥ [6.61]> <vaiśvānaro
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.3_2: <śaṃ no vāto vātu [7.69]> <agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn [11.6]> iti
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.8_0: <atisṛṣṭo apāṃ vṛṣabhaḥ [16.1.1]> ity apo_atisṛjya sarvā imā āpa oṣadhaya iti pṛṣṭvā
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.8_1: sarvā ity ākhyāta oṃ bṛhaspatiprasūtaḥ karavāṇīty anujñāpya_oṃ savitṛprasūtaḥ kurutāṃ
GV06kaussu_u:1.9.10: anyatarayā kurvīteti yuvā kauśiko yuvā kauśikaḥ
GV06kaussu_u:2.1_10_12: purastād agneḥ kalmāṣam daṇḍaṃ nihatya paścād agneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānā anumantrayate
GV06kaussu_u:2.1_10_16: <ahaṃ rudrebhir [4.30]> iti śuklapuṣpaharitapuṣpe kiṃstyanābhipippalyau jātarūpaśakalena prāk stanagrahāt prāśayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.1_10_17: prathamapravadasya mātur upasthe tālūni saṃpātān ānayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.1_10_20: <tvaṃ no medhe [6.108]> <dyauś ca ma [12.1.35]> iti bhakṣayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.1_10_24: <prātar agniṃ [3.16]> <girāv aragarāṭeṣu [6.69]> <divaspṛthivyāḥ [6.125.2]> iti saṃhāya mukhaṃ vimārṣṭi
GV06kaussu_u:2.2_11_5: ājyaśeṣe pipīlikodvāpān opya grāmam etya sarvahutān
GV06kaussu_u:2.2_11_16: jihvāyā utsādyam akṣyoḥ +paristaraṇaṃ mastṛhaṇaṃ [ed. paristaraṇamastṛhaṇaṃ; see MSS 34 (1976), p. 23f.] hṛdayaṃ dūrśa upanahya tisro rātrīḥ palpūlane vāsayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.2_11_19: <asmin vasu [1.9]> <yad ābadhnan [1.35]> <nava prāṇān [5.28]> iti yugmakṛṣṇalaṃ vāsitaṃ badhnāti
GV06kaussu_u:2.3_12_2: camase sarūpavatsāyā dugdhe vrīhiyavāvavadhāya mūrchayitvā madhv āsicyāśyati
GV06kaussu_u:2.3_12_5: <sahṛdayaṃ [3.30]> <tad ū ṣu [5.1.5]> <saṃ jānīdhvam [6.64]> <eha yātu [6.73]> <saṃ vaḥ pṛcyantāṃ [6.74]> <saṃ vo manāṃsi [6.94]> <saṃjñānaṃ naḥ [7.52]> iti sāṃmanasyāni
GV06kaussu_u:2.3_12_6: udakūlijaṃ saṃpātavantaṃ grāmaṃ parihṛtya madhye ninayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.3_12_8: trihāyaṇyā vatsataryāḥ śuktyāni [see Caland, ZR] piśitāny āśayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.4_13_6: etayoḥ <prātar agniṃ [3.16]> <girāv aragarāṭeṣu [6.69]> <divaspṛthivyāḥ [6.125.2]> iti sapta marmāṇi sthālīpāke pṛktāny aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:2.4_13_7: akuśalaṃ yo brāhmaṇo lohitam aśnīyād iti gārgyaḥ
GV06kaussu_u:2.4_13_12: śuni kilāsam aje palitaṃ tṛṇe jvaro yo_asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tasmin rājayakṣma iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇaṃ nirasyati gandhapravādābhir alaṃ kurute
GV06kaussu_u:2.5_14_17: <agnir naḥ śatrūn [3.1]> agnir no dūtaḥ [3.2]> iti mohanāni
GV06kaussu_u:2.5_14_28: bhāṅgamauñjān pāśan iṅgiḍālaṃkṛtān saṃpātavato_anūktān senākrameṣu vapati
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_1: <ṛdhaṅ mantras [5.1]> <tad id āsa [5.2]> ity āśvatthyāṃ pātryāṃ trivṛti gomayaparicaye hastipṛṣṭhe puruṣaśirasi vāmitrāñ juhvad abhiprakramya nivapati
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_2: +varāhavihatād [ed. varāhavihitād; Caland, Kl.Schr. p. 70] rājāno vediṃ kurvanti
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_4: ekeṣvā hatasyādahane_upasamādhāya dīrghadaṇḍeṇa sruveṇa rathcakrasya khena samayā juhoti
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_6: <yadi cin nu tvā [5.2.4]> <namo devavadhebhyo [6.13]> ity anvāha
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_10: +yaṃ [ed.: yan; Caland, Kl.Schr. p. 57] na paśyed na yudhyeta
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_11: <ni tad dadhiṣe [5.2.6]> <vanaspate [12.3.33]> <ayā viṣṭhā [7.3]> <agna indraś [7.110]> <diśas catasro [8.8.22]> iti navaṃ rathaṃ rājānaṃ sasārathim
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_15: sāṃgrāmikam etā vyādiśati madhye mṛtyur itare sene
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_16: parājeṣyamāṇān mṛtyur ativartate jyeṣyanto mṛtyum [note conj. Speijer Museum 9 249]
GV06kaussu_u:2.6_15_17: agreṣūtkucatsu mukhyā hanyante madhyeṣu madhyā anteṣu_avare
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_1: <uccair ghoṣo [5.20]> <upa śvāsaya [6.126]> iti sarvavāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagara_uśīreṇa saṃdhāvya saṃpātavanti trir āhatya prayachati
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_4: <pari vartmāni [6.67]> <indro jayāti [6.98]> iti rājā triḥ senāṃ pariyāti
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_20: uttarato_agner lohitāśvatthasya śākhāṃ nihatya nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ paritatya <nīlalohitenāmūn [8.8.24e]> iti dakṣiṇā prahāpayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_28: ānuśūkānāṃ vrīhīṇām āvraskajaiḥ kāmpīlaiḥ śṛtaṃ sārūpavatsam āśayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_29_1: vāsitaṃ baddhvā sūtrotaṃ barhiṣi kṛtvā saṃpātavantaṃ pratyṛcaṃ bhṛṣṭīr abhīvarttottamābhyām
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_30: <acikradat [3.3]> <ā tvā gan [3.4]> iti yasmād rāṣṭrād avaruddhas tasyāśāyāṃ śayanavidhaṃ puroḍāśaṃ darbheṣūdake ninayati
GV06kaussu_u:2.7_16_31: tato loṣṭena jyotir āyatanaṃ saṃstīrya kṣīraudanam aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_1: <bhūto bhūteṣu [4.8]> iti rājānam abhiṣekṣyan mahānade śāntyudakaṃ karoty
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_2: sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā dakṣiṇataḥ parigṛhyāyā darbheṣu tiṣṭhantam abhiṣiñcati
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_6: sahaiva nau sukṛtaṃ saha duṣkṛtam iti brahmā brūyāt
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_7: yo duṣkṛtaṃ karavat tasya duṣkṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ nau saheti
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_14: catvāro rājaputrās tālpāḥ pṛthakpādeṣu śayanaṃ parāmṛśya sabhāṃ prāpayanti
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_19: utsṛjāmi brāhmaṇāya_utsṛjāmi kṣatriyāya_utsṛjāmi vaiśyāya dharmo me janapade caryatām iti
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_27: kuryur gām iti gārgyapārthaśravasau neti bhāgaliḥ
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_28: <imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ me [4.22]> iti kṣatriyaṃ prātaḥ_prātar
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_30: <savitā prasavānām [5.24]> iti paurohitye vatsyan vaiśvalopīḥ samidha ādhāya
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_32: tad āhur na kṣatriyaṃ sāvitrīṃ vācayed iti
GV06kaussu_u:2.8_17_33: kathaṃ nu tam upanayīta yan na vācayed
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_1: pūrvasya pūrvasyāṃ paurṇamāsyām astamita udakānte kṛṣṇacailaparihito nirṛtikarmāṇi prayuṅkte
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_7: śāpeṭam ālipyāpsu nibadhya tasminn upasamādhāya saṃpātavantaṃ karoti
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_10: upamucya jaradupānahau savyena jarat_chattraṃ dakṣiṇena śālātṛṇāṇy ādīpya jīrṇaṃ vīriṇam abhinyasyati
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_13: jīrṇe vīriṇa upasamādhāya <ayaṃ te yonir [3.20]> iti jaratkoṣṭhād vrīhīñ śarkarāmiśrān āvapati
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_16: kṛṣṇaśakuneḥ savyajaṅghāyām aṅkam anubadhyāṅke puroḍāśaṃ <pra patetaḥ [7.115]> iti anāvṛtaṃ prapādayati
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_17: nīlaṃ saṃdhāya lohitam āchādya śuklaṃ pariṇahya dvitīyayā_uṣṇīṣam aṅkena_upasādya savyena sahāṅkenāvāṅ apsu_apavidhyati
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_20: kulāyaśṛtaṃ [ed. kulāya ś-, but cf. Caland Kl. Schr. 58] haritabarhiṣam aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_22: nāvyayoḥ sāṃvaidye paścād agner bhūmiparilekhe kīlālaṃ mukhenāśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.1_18_37: tam u cen na vinded atha sattrasyāyatane yajñāyatanam iva kṛtvā
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_1: <ambayo yanty [1.4.1]> śaṃbhumayobhubhyāṃ [1.5 + 1.6] <brahma jajñānam [4.1]> <ā gāvo [4.21.1]> <ekā ca me [5.15.1]> iti gā lavaṇaṃ pāyayaty
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_4: <saṃ saṃ sravantu [1.15.1]> iti nāvyābhyām udakam āharataḥ sarvata upāsecam
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_7: yasya śriyaṃ kāmayate tato vrīhi_ājyapaya āhārya kṣīraudanam aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_8: tadalābhe haritagomayam āhārya śoṣayitvā trivṛti gomayaparicaye śṛtam
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_13: tān udāvrajann udapātrasya_udapātreṇābhiplāvayati mukhaṃ vimārṣṭi [note conj. Speijer Museum 9 250]
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_14: <eha yantu paśavo [2.26.1]> <saṃ vo goṣṭhena [3.24.1]> <prajāvatīḥ [4.21.7 / 7.75]> <prajāpatir [6.11.3]> iti goṣṭhakarmāṇi
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_19: sārūpavatse śakṛtpiṇḍān guggululavaṇe pratinīya paścād agner nikhanati
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_22: <āyam agan [3.5.1]> <ayaṃ pratisaro [8.5.1]> <ayaṃ me varaṇo [10.3.1]> <arātīyor [10.6.1]> iti mantroktān vāsitān badhnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_23: uttamasya caturo jātarūpaśakalenānusūtraṃ gamayitvāvabhujya traidhaṃ paryasyati
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_25: <tam imaṃ devatā [10.6.29]> iti vāsitam ullupya <brahmaṇā tejasā [10.6.30]> iti badhnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_28: <prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā [3.10]> ity aṣṭakyāyā vapāṃ sarveṇa sūktena trir juhoti
GV06kaussu_u:3.2_19_30: sahahutān ājyamiśrān hutvā paścād agner vāgyataḥ saṃviśati
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_5: <aśvinā phālaṃ kalpayatām upāvatu bṛhaspatiḥ | yathāsad bahudhānyam ayakṣmaṃ bahupūruṣam [PS 8.18.6]> iti phālam atikarṣati
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_6: <irāvān asi dhārtarāṣṭre tava me sattre rādhyatām [-]> iti pratimimīte
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_9: tisraḥ sītāḥ prācīr gamayanti kalyāṇīr vāco vadantaḥ
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_10: <sīte vandāmahe tvā [3.17.8]> ity āvartayitvā_uttarasmin sītānte puroḍāśena_indraṃ yajate
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_16: yatra saṃpātān ānayati tato loṣṭaṃ dhārayantaṃ patnī pṛchaty akṛkṣata_iti
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_19: <vittiṃ bhūtiṃ puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ paśūn annam annādyam [cf. i.a. PS 5.35.1, PS 19.53.19? (= PSK 19.53.10)]> iti
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_22: sītāśiraḥsu darbhān āstīrya plakṣa_udumbarasya trīṃs_trīṃś camasān nidadhāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.3_20_23: rasavato dakṣiṇe śaṣpavato madhyame puroḍāśavata uttare
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_2: śāntaphalaśilākṛtiloṣṭavalmīkarāśivāpaṃ trīṇi kūdīprāntāni madhyamapalāśe darbheṇa pariveṣṭya rāśipalyeṣu karoti
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_7: <ayaṃ no nabhasas patiḥ [6.79]> iti palye_aśmānaṃ saṃprokṣyānvṛcaṃ kāśī opyāvāpayati
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_11: karkīpravādānāṃ dvādaśadāmnyāṃ saṃpātavatyām <ayaṃ ghāso ... iha vatsām [4.38.7cd]> iti mantroktam
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_13: tisraḥ kūdīmayīr ūrṇanābhikulāya parihitā anvaktā ādadhāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_14: atyanteṣīkāmauñjaparihitā [thus with Caland, AZ p. 55, n. 5] madhunā pralipya cikkaśeṣu paryasya
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_17: <ardham ardhena [5.1.9]> ity ārdrapāṇir asaṃjñātvā [so Caland; ed. ārdrapāṇī rasaṃ jñātvā] prayachati
GV06kaussu_u:3.4_21_23: <stuṣva varṣman [5.2.7]> iti prājāpatyāmāvāsyāyām astamite valmīkaśirasi darbhāvastīrṇe_adhyadhi dīpaṃ dhārayaṃs trir juhoti
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_1: <ṛdhaṅmantro [5.1]> <tad id āsa [5.2]> iti maiśradhānyaṃ bhṛṣṭapiṣṭaṃ lohitālaṃkṛtaṃ rasamiśram aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_2: abhṛṣṭaṃ plakṣa_udumbarasya_uttarato_agnes triṣu camaseṣu pūrvāhṇasya tejasāgram annasya prāśiṣam iti pūrvāhṇe
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_3: madhyandinasya tejasā madhyam annasya prāśi.am iti madhyandine
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_4: aparāhṇasya tejasā sarvam annasya prāśiṣam ity aparāhṇe
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_6: yat kṣetraṃ kāmayate tasmin kīlālaṃ dadhimadhumiśram
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_7: saṃvatsaraṃ striyam anupetya śuktyāṃ reta ānīya taṇḍulamiśraṃ saptagrāmam
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_8: dvādaśīm amāvāsyā_iti kṣīrabhakṣo bhavaty amāvāsyāyāṃ dadhimadhubhakṣas tasya mūtre_udakadadhimadhupalpūlanāni_āsicya
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_9: <kravyādaṃ nāḍī pra viveśāgniṃ prajābhāṅgirato māyayaitau | āvāṃ devī juṣāṇe ghṛtācī imam annādyāya pra viśataṃ svāhā [-]> iti
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_10: niśāyām āgrayaṇataṇḍulān udakyān madhumiśrān nidadhāty ā yavānāṃ paṅkteḥ
GV06kaussu_u:3.5_22_14: <mamāgne varco [5.3]> iti sāttrikān agnīn darbhapūtīkabhāṅgābhiḥ paristīrya gārhapatyaśṛtaṃ sarveṣu saṃpātavantaṃ gārhapatyadeśe_aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.6_23_1: <yajūṃṣi yajñe [5.26]> iti navaśālāyāṃ sarpir madhumiśram aśnāti [but Caland: juhoti]
GV06kaussu_u:3.6_23_5: śālām aṅgulibhyāṃ saṃprokṣya gṛhapatnyāsāda upaviśya_udapātraṃ ninayati
GV06kaussu_u:3.6_23_7: <ūrdhvā asya [5.27]> iti vārṣmaṇam audumbaraṃ manthapratirūpam abhijuhoti
GV06kaussu_u:3.6_23_9: <tvaṣṭā me []> iti prātar +vibhakṣyamāṇo [so Caland; ed. vibhuṅkṣyamāṇo]_aśnāti
GV06kaussu_u:3.6_23_12: <vāyur enāḥ [6.141]> iti yuktayoś citrākarma niśāyāṃ saṃbhārān saṃpātavataḥ
GV06kaussu_u:3.6_23_13: aparedyur <vāyur enāḥ [6.141]> iti śākhayā_udakadhārayā gāḥ parikrāmati
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_2: ājyamiśrān yavān urvarāyāṃ kṛṣṭe phālena_uduhyānvṛcaṃ kāśīn ninayati nivapati
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_3: <abhi tyam [7.14]> iti mahāvakāśe_araṇya unnate vimite prāgdvārapratyagdvāreṣv apsu saṃpātān ānayati
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_11: proṣya samidha ādāya_ <ūrjaṃ bibhrad [7.60]> iti gṛhasaṃkāśe japati
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_12: savyena samidho dakṣiṇena śālāvalīkaṃ saṃstabhya japati
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_13: ativrajya samidha ādhāya <sumaṅgali prajāvati suśīme [so Caland; ed. susīme] _ahaṃ vāṃ gṛhapatir jīvyāsam> iti sthūṇe gṛhṇāty upatiṣṭhate
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_18: dūrvāgrair añjalau_apa ānīya darśaṃ dārśībhir upatiṣṭhate
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_20: retodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi vayodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi yūthatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi gaṇatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi sahasrapoṣāyai tvātisṛjāmy aparimitapos.āyai tvātisṛjāmi
GV06kaussu_u:3.7_24_21: <etaṃ vo yuvānaṃ [9.4.24]> iti purāṇaṃ pravṛtya navam utsṛjate saṃprokṣati

GV06kaussu_u:14.3_139_27: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati taṃtaṃ kurvate
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_4: saṃbhṛteṣu saṃbhāreṣu brahmā rājā ca_ubhau snātau_ahatavasanau surabhiṇau vratavantau karmaṇyau_upavasataḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_5: śvo bhūte śaṃ no devyāḥ pādair ardharcābhyām ṛcā ṣaṭkṛtvā_udakam ācāmataḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_8: <ā tvāhārṣam [6.87.1]>_<dhruvā dyaur [6.88.1]> <viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu [6.87.1c]>_iti sarvato_apramattā dhārayeran
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_10: <abhibhūr yajño [6.97.1]>_ity etais tribhiḥ sūktair anvārabdhe rājani pūrṇahomaṃ juhuyāt
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_13: ye rājño bhṛtyāḥ syuḥ sarve dīkṣitā brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_15: trir ayanam ahnām upatiṣṭhante haviṣā ca yajante
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_17: <indra kṣatram [7.84.2]> iti haviṣo hutvā brāhmaṇān paricareyuḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_18: na saṃsthitahomāñ juhuyād ity āhur ācāryāḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_20: apāṃ sūktair āplutya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyāpa upaspṛśyānavekṣamāṇāḥ pratyudāvrajanti
GV06kaussu_u:14.4_140_22: śvaḥśvo_asya rāṣṭraṃ jyāyo bhavati_eko_asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā bhavati na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṇ veda yaś ca_evaṃ vidvān indramaheṇa carati
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_5: <ardhamāsaṃ copākṛtya kṣaperaṃs tryaham utsṛjya | ārambhaḥ śrāvaṇyām uktaḥ pauṣyām utsarga ucyate [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_10: ācāryāstamite vā yeṣāṃ ca mānuṣī yoniḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_24: atha pramāṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ samānaṃ vidyudulkayoḥ | mārgaśīrṣapauṣamāghāparapakṣeṣu tisro_aṣṭakāḥ
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_27: <janane maraṇe caiva daśarātro vidhīyate | ācārye daśarātraṃ syāt sarveṣu ca svayoniṣu [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_28: sūtake tu_eko nādhīyīta trirātram upādhyāyaṃ varjayet
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_30: atha śiṣyaṃ sahādhyāyinam apradhānaguruṃ ca_upasannam ahorātraṃ varjayet
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_33: <aviśeṣartukālena sarve nirghātādayaḥ smṛtāḥ | yac cānyad daivam adbhutaṃ sarvaṃ nirghātavad bhavet [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_34: <ṛtāv adhyāyaś chāndasaḥ kālpya āpartukaḥ smṛtaḥ | ṛtāv ūrdhvaṃ prātarāśād yas tu kaś cid anadhyāyaḥ | saṃdhyāṃ prāpnoti paścimām [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_36: niśi nigadāyāṃ ca vidyuti śiṣṭaṃ nādhīyīta
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_37: <astamite dvisattāyāṃ trisattāyāṃ ca pāṭavaḥ | atha tāvat kālaṃ bhuktvā pradoṣa [corr. Bloomfield GGA 1902 514 -- ed. padoṣa] ubhe saṃdhye [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_38: <apsu śmaśāne śayyāyām abhiśaste khileṣu ca | antaḥśave rathyāyāṃ grāme cāṇḍālasaṃyute [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_39: <durgandhe śūdrasaṃśrāve paiṅge śabde bhaye rute | vaidhṛtye nagareṣu ca [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_40: <aniktena ca vāsasā caritaṃ yena maithunam | śayānaḥ prauḍhapādo cāgratopasthāntike guroḥ [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_41: <viramya mārute śīghre pratyārambho vibhāṣitaḥ | sarveṇāpararātreṇa viramya pratyārambho na vidyute [-]>
GV06kaussu_u:14.5_141_45: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ
